intro: Spermacoce tenuis, commonly known as the slender starapple, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, Asia, and the Americas. The plant produces small, white to pink flowers that are clustered in umbels, and it is often found in moist, shaded environments. Its fruit is a capsule that splits open to release tiny, wind-dispersed seeds. Spermacoce tenuis is also known for its medicinal properties in traditional herbal medicine.
